document.full_text: a nascent recovery in global dealmaking, focused on safer deals with clear strategic logic, probably marks the start of several years of rising mergers and acquisitions, senior bankers told the reuters global m&a summit.
document.title: boards play it safe as new m&a cycle begins
lines_and_colors: a nascent recovery in global dealmaking, focused on safer deals with clear strategic logic, probably marks the start of several years of rising mergers and acquisitions, senior bankers told the reuters global m&a summit.
